synopsis.text: Hestia Familia's Bell Cranel finds himself in a hot water predicament, this time, quite literally! The Dian Cecht Familia has just opened a new natural hot spring in Orario, causing a wave of excitement among the city's residents. However, not everyone is convinced of its authenticity. Naaza of the rival Miach Familia suspects foul play and believes that the idea was stolen from him. Caught in the middle of this escalating feud, Bell is tasked with uncovering the truth behind the mysterious hot spring. As Bell and his fellow Hestia Familia members delve deeper into the investigation, they soon discover that this seemingly harmless thermal bath is hiding dangerous secrets. With obstacles at every turn, Bell must navigate through treacherous traps and face off against formidable foes to unravel the truth and restore peace between the warring Familias.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
